insertProduct.caption: Data Reviewer
insertProduct.description: Provides a variety of tools to help perform and manage QA/QC of spatial data.

button.caption: Add Reviewer Results
button.extendedCaption: Add Reviewer Results to Project
button.tooltip:
Add Data Reviewer quality control results to your project. Results represent a feature or row that has been marked as an anomaly by data validation or manual inspection. It contains information about the source of the anomaly and may include a geometry.
Results are organized by session and stored in feature classes and tables in either a file or enterprise geodatabase. The project saves a reference to the workspace and associated sessions.
Data Reviewer results have already been added to the project. You can access Reviewer Results from the Catalog pane

button.caption: Add Reviewer Batch Jobs
button.extendedCaption: Add Reviewer Batch Jobs to Project
button.tooltip: Add existing Batch Jobs to the project.

button.caption: Add Session...
button.extendedCaption: Add Reviewer Sessions to Project
button.tooltip: Add an existing Reviewer session to the project. This allows you to view the results in the Reviewer Results pane. You can add more than one session to the connection, but can only view the results for one session at a time.

button.caption: New Session...
button.extendedCaption: Create a new Reviewer Session to Project
button.tooltip: Create a new Reviewer session to the project.

button.caption: Update Results Connection...
button.extendedCaption: Update connection to Reviewer Results in Project
button.tooltip: Update a connection to results referenced by the project.

button.caption: Remove Results Connection
button.extendedCaption: Remove Reviewer Results from Project
button.tooltip: Remove a connection to results stored in an existing Reviewer workspace.

button.caption: Full Database
button.extendedCaption: Executes Reviewer Batch Job on Full Database
button.tooltip: Run batch job on all data sources in the active map using the Execute Reviewer Batch Job geoprocessing tool.

button.caption: Active Map Extent
button.extendedCaption: Executes Reviewer Batch Job on Active Map Extent
button.tooltip: Run batch job on all data sources in the active map extent using the Execute Reviewer Batch Job geoprocessing tool.

button.caption: Remove
button.extendedCaption: Remove Reviewer Batch Job from Project
button.tooltip: Remove the reference to the selected Data Reviewer Batch Job from the project.

button.caption: Open
button.extendedCaption: Open Reviewer Results pane with results from the Session
button.tooltip: View the session results in the Reviewer Results pane.

button.caption: Remove
button.extendedCaption: Remove Reviewer Session from Project
button.tooltip: Remove the reference to the session from the project.

button.caption: Make Default
button.extendedCaption: Set the selected Session as default
button.tooltip: Make this Session the default Session for the project that is currently open.

button.caption: Delete...
button.extendedCaption: Delete Reviewer Session from Project
button.tooltip: Delete the item from the project. The project's reference to the selected session is removed from the project and permanantly deleted from the Data Reviewer workspace.

button.caption: Zoom To Results
button.extendedCaption: Zoom to Reviewer Results from Reviewer Results pane
button.tooltip: Zoom to result geometry. If result geometry is empty it will zoom to the feature geometry.

button.caption: Pan To Results
button.extendedCaption: Pan to Reviewer Results from Reviewer Results pane
button.tooltip: Pan to result geometry. If result geometry is empty it will pan to the feature geometry.

button.caption: Update Results
button.extendedCaption: Open Update Results pane with selected results from Reviewer Results pane
button.tooltip: Open update results pane to update result status.

button.caption: Open
button.extendedCaption: Open metadata of the Reviewer Results from Reviewer Results pane
button.tooltip: Open the metadata of the selected item.

button.caption: Add To Project
button.extendedCaption: Add Reviewer Batch Job to Project from Folder
button.tooltip: Add an existing reviewer batch job to the project. The project saves a reference to the reviewer batch job file.

button.caption: Reviewer Rules
button.extendedCaption: Open Reviewer rules view for the selected layer
button.tooltip:
Show the Reviewer Rules view.
A Reviewer Rule enables you to detect data which does not comply with quality requirements defined by your organization. Non-compliant data are returned as Reviewer Results to assist in corrective workflows that improve quality.

button.caption: Import...
button.tooltip: TDB.

customControl.caption: Run Reviewer Rules
customControl.extendedCaption: Run Reviewer Validation Rules for the Active Map

customControl.caption: History
customControl.extendedCaption: View Validation history for the Active Map
customControl.tooltip: View history or cancel current validation

button.caption: Delete
button.extendedCaption: Delete selected Reviewer rules
button.tooltip: Delete selected rules. Select one or more rules to delete.

button.caption: Manage Quality
button.extendedCaption: Manage the quality of the data
button.tooltip: Improve data quality using automated tools to detect, track and report errors. Authorize and enable the Data Reviewer Extension to access this functionality.

button.caption: Close Manage Quality
button.extendedCaption: Close Manage Quality tab
button.tooltip: Close the Manage Quality ribbon.

button.caption: Browse Features
button.extendedCaption: Browse features and commit selected features as Reviewer results
button.tooltip: Browse features selected in your map and create error results for features that fail visual review. You must have an active Reviewer Results session open or a default Reviewer Results session specified in your project.

button.caption: Zoom To
button.extendedCaption: Zoom to selected features
button.tooltip: Zoom to selected features

button.caption: Pan To
button.extendedCaption: Pan to selected features
button.tooltip: Pan to selected features

button.caption: Flash
button.extendedCaption: Flash selected feature
button.tooltip: Flash selected feature

customControl.caption: Flag Missing Features
customControl.extendedCaption: Flag missing features as Reviewer results

menu.caption: Reviewer Batch Jobs
menu.extendedCaption: Add Reviewer Batch Jobs to Project

menu.caption: Reviewer Results
menu.extendedCaption: Context menu for Reviewer Session Results Project item

menu.caption: Batch Jobs Menu
menu.extendedCaption: Context Menu for Reviewer Batch Job Project item

menu.caption: Reviewer Session
menu.extendedCaption: Context menu for Reviewer Sessions Project item

menu.caption: Selected Results Context Menu
menu.extendedCaption: Context menu for actions to perform on selected results

menu.caption: Batch Job Menu
menu.extendedCaption: Context menu for Batch Jobs in Folder

menu.caption: Selected Metadata Results Context Menu
menu.extendedCaption: Context menu for actions to perform on selected metadata results

menu.caption: Common Context Menu for All Results Type
menu.extendedCaption: Common context menu for actions to perform on all types of results

menu.caption: Selected Rules Context Menu
menu.extendedCaption: Context menu for actions to perform on selected reviewer rules

menu.caption: Evaluate Features Context Menu
menu.extendedCaption: Context menu for actions to perform on selected features in Evaluate Features pane

gallery.caption: New Rule
gallery.tooltip: Data Reviewer checks are a series of data validation methods that enable you to automate the detection of features which do not comply with established data quality requirements defined by your organization.
